attributes.action: Abolish Tax on bonus pay or commission in wages. Only tax normal pay for that month.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel it is very unjust that the harder you work the more you get taxed.We should be able to benefit from christmas bonuses and/or commission as it is an added extra and not part of our wages. How do you propose we better ourselves if all our many is taken by either poll tax or income tax? Click on this petition if you agree. Thanks.
